sentences.en: Alleles of the same gene occupy the equivalent locus on homologous chromosomes.
sentences.cn: 等位基因位于同源染色体相对应的位点上.

sentences.en: Cross - overs have occurred independently of each other between pair of homologous chromosomes.
sentences.cn: 交换现象独立地在每一对同源染色体之间发生.

sentences.en: Each of the 46 chromosomes is a member of a homologous pair.
sentences.cn: 46条染色体的每一条都是一个同源对的成员。

sentences.en: Each type evokes antibodies which protect against the homologous, but not heterologous virus.
sentences.cn: 每一种抗原型都能产生抗同种病毒的抗体, 但对异种病毒则不能.

sentences.en: Each type evokes antibodies which protect against the homologous.
sentences.cn: 每一种类型都能产生抗同种病毒的抗体.

sentences.en: Having the same alleles at gene locus on homologous chromosomes.
sentences.cn: (遗传学)在相应的染色体位点上具有同样的等位基因.

sentences.en: Homogametic sex The sex with homologous sex chromosomes, in mammals, designated XX.
sentences.cn: 同配性别:指有相同性染色体的性别, 在哺乳动物中, 它用XX来表示.

sentences.en: Homologous parts, as has been remarked by some authors, tend to cohere.
sentences.cn: 某些作者曾经说过,同源部分有互相合生的倾向.

sentences.en: If both of a pair of homologous chromosomes are missing, nullisomy results.
sentences.cn: 如果一对同源染色体都缺失了, 称为缺体.

sentences.en: Nucleotide sequences homologous to oncornaviruses DNA products have been observed in human leukaemic cells.
sentences.cn: 在人白血病细胞中,已经观察到与肿瘤毒病DNA产物相同的核苷酸序列.

sentences.en: Stereoisomerism is encountered in the homologous series.
sentences.cn: 在烯烃同系列中出现了立体异构现象.

sentences.en: The collapse of the protostella is extremely non - homologous.
sentences.cn: 原恒星云的坍缩是极其不保形的.

sentences.en: The former are considered to be homologous with the sepals of Ranunculus.
sentences.cn: 一般认为,前者的花瓣与毛茛属植物花萼同源.

sentences.en: The gradation in the physical properties of the alkanes is typical of a homologous series.
sentences.cn: 烷烃物理性质的逐渐变化是同系列的特点.

sentences.en: The seal's flipper is homologous with the human arm.
sentences.cn: 海豹的鳍肢与人类的手臂同源。

sentences.en: There are so many important genes on every chromosome that the loss of both members of a homologous pair would be fatal, wouldn’t even get past embryonic development.
sentences.cn: 每一条染色体上都包含了数量巨大的重要基因，而同时丢失一对同源染色体将是致命的，生命甚至通不过胚胎发育期。

sentences.en: Translocation occurs when a fragment of one chromosome becomes attached to a non - homologous chromosome.
sentences.cn: 一段染色体跟 非 同源染色体连在一起时就发生易位.

words.tran_cn: 相应的；一致的；同源的（等于homologic或者homologous）
同源；相同；异体同形；同族关系
相应的；[免疫][化学][生物]同源的；类似的；一致的

trans.tran_cn: 相应的，类似的，一致的，同源的
trans.tran_en: having a related or similar position, structure, etc
